text: 2. 2.4.2: Consider a mass and spring system with a mass m = 2, spring constant k¥ = 3, and damping constant ¢ = 1. a) Set up and find the general solution of the system. b) Is the system underdamped, overdamped or critically damped? c) If the system is not critically damped, find a c that makes the system critically damped.
